name: Potion Rush
description:
Following the prompt of "Out of Control", take the role of a tiny Kobold named Mint as you sneak into a potion shop in order to get the fabled dragon potion from the mighty shopkeep Wizzer who frankly is selling it for a way too expensive price. You can play the game with Keyboard and Mouse or with a controller

Have fun in this top down "Tosser" Y'all!

Keyboard and Mouse:

  • WASD/Mouse to aim
  • Directional Buttons to Move
  • Enter/Space/Left Click to Charge/Throw Potions

Gamepad:

  • Left Stick or D-pad to move
  • Right Stick to aim
  • X button or Right Trigger to Charge/Throw Potions (Dual Shock 4)
